alert.note: Alert for Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 11:59PM MST until November 10 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, bringing total snow accumulations up to 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
